title: 为什么普通玩家没有QS商店权限？
author: aidu__
txt_content: 为什么普通玩家不能开QS商店啊？怎么配置？！？求教...

replies.author: 61叔叔
replies.txt_content:
基本权限:
    quickshop.use - 使用箱子商店的权限
    quickshop.create.sell - 可以创建出售型商店的权限
    quickshop.create.buy - 可以创建收购型商店的权限,对着出售型商店打/qs buy
    quickshop.create.double - 创建大箱子(两个连一起的箱子)商店的权限
   给玩家添加权限
     /mangaddp builder 上面的权限

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
quickshop.use - Required to use ANY quickshop
    quickshop.create.sell - Required to make a QuickShop (At all)
    quickshop.create.buy - Required to use /qs buy (Change the shop type from Sell -> Buy)
    quickshop.create.double - Required to make doublechest shops.
    quickshop.create.changeprice - Required to use /qs price (Ability to change the price of a shop without destroying it. This may allow for some scammers to quickly change the price while someone is buying.
    quickshop.bypass.ItemID - Required to sell blacklisted items (E.g. bedrock)
    quickshop.find - Required to use /qs find <item>

replies.author: aidu__
replies.txt_content:
61叔叔 发表于 2014-7-17 13:29

    quickshop.use - 使用箱子商店的权限
    quickshop.create.sell - 可以创建出售型商店的 ...
请问怎么添加？能不能QQ教教我，我比较笨..Q1466519183

replies.author: konghaomin123
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder quickshop.create.double
/mangaddp builder quickshop.create.buy
/mangaddp builder quickshop.create.sell 
/mangaddp builder quickshop.use
